headline.main: Carbon Monoxide Found Harmful at Low Levels

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Levels of carbon monoxide considered safe by Federal air quality standards can create a potentially dangerous oxygen shortage in the hearts of people with coronary artery disease, a study has shown.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Levels of carbon monoxide considered safe by Federal air quality standards can create a potentially dangerous oxygen shortage in the hearts of people with coronary artery disease, a study has shown.
